Text:
Thank you for some great clips. But when you make the screens - can you please try to do like this: 

One pic with the girls face         - so we can identify her
One with the girl fully dressed  - so we can identify the movie
One pic with the girl fully nude - so we can see her body in case she is new
And one big screen shot           - so that we can see what kind of action there is. 

The image of the nuns above doesn't really make me wanna se the movie. 

Thanks a lot anyway!
